title: Riot what do you think about draven 0 presence in lcs despite 55% win rate?
body: he should be op bust still sees 0 lcs play

replies.body: Draven feeds off of noobs and disorganized teams. He is easy (for an experienced team) to counter and shut down due to how his axes and kit in general work, and hard countered by various fairly common ADCs.
He's absurdly high risk to pick. Overall not worth it when you can play a moderately safe champion.

Some champions are stronger in SoloQ, some champions are stronger in competitive.

Draven is strong in SoloQ and imo not so strong in competitive.

Just like when {{champion:7}} {{champion:91}} had their op silences and damages for _**years**_ without seeing LCS plays.

someone, sometime will pick {{champion:119}}  out of the sudden just like how that Chinese dude picked 
{{champion:236}}  against faker mid and dumbstered him than it became a trend.

also many UP champs still see LCS play for no real reason even with their HUGE disadvantages like {{champion:60}} {{champion:82}} .

dont waist time thinking of it, it just happen or not.
